Most of us have seen Hijikata's helmet and arm guards already...I 
recently found full body chainmail in a Japanese Shinsengumi 
book...I uploaded the pic in the PHOTOS>Shinsengumi Artifacts (next 
to Itou's hat)...the image is big enough to read the Japanese 
caption I wonder who owned this artifact ^_^...

The same image is available at another Japanese Shinsengumi site as 
well (but also a black and white image)
